author: blumm
msg: The <document_element> of the Document Type Declaration (DOCTYPE) must be 'mapping' instead of 'databases'.

author: blumm
msg: The attribute 'class' is replaced by attribute 'type' in elements 'jsp:useBean'
for columnFragment.jsp, PageFragment.jsp, RootFragment.jsp,RowFragment.jsp and TabNavigation.jsp.
The JSP1.2 Spec provides the rationale:
The type attribute should be used to specify a Java type that
cannot be instantiated as a JavaBean (i.e. a Java type that is an abstract
interface, or a class with no public no-args constructor). If the class
used for a Java type that cannot be instantiated as a JavaBean, the
may consider the page invalid, and is recommended to (but not required to)
produce a fatal translation error at translation time, or a
